PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-03242019-04-12,  AAFC,  CFIA,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActHealth of Animals Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Health of Animals Regulations (Zoning)
PrecisRegulations Amending the HEALTH OF ANIMALS REGULATIONS (ZONING) in order to (1) reflect the new requirement of permits under the Act and authorize the amendment of permits and licences after their issuance; (2) provide for the issuance of general permits and licences under the HEALTH OF ANIMALS REGULATIONS; and (3) remove a reference to a federal statute that has been repealed..
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0099 Publication Date: 2019-05-01
AttachmentsAttachment
